response.overview: Building on the first installment, INKO COLORS 2 continues the daily life and adventures of the parakeet team. This time, they face new challenges—perhaps another lost bird, new clues to follow, and deeper tests of friendship, cooperation, and trust.  Through charming dialogue and gentle visuals, the audience will be immersed once again in the warm and whimsical bird society.  This sequel uses Blender to create a cell-look 3D CG animation style, blending dimensionality with flat aesthetics.
response.title: Inko Colors 2
